name: calendarappcompany
short_description:
The Calendar App Company has teamed up with some of your favourite people to transform their 2014 printed calendars into interactive downloadable apps straight onto your iphone and ipad.

Launching in 2013, Calendar App Company have successfully taken the next step in the mobile and tablet revolution for the 2014 calendars. You can now download your favourite official Calendar App through the Apple iTunes store. We have some of your favourite models, pop stars, sports stars and bands to name but a few with new titles joining us every week.

OFFICIAL CALENDAR APPS PACKED WITH FEATURES

Being at the forefront of the digital marketplace means we have produced a fully interactive easy to use interface calendar compressed into an iphone and ipad application. With behind the scenes videos and a birthday messages, our official calendar apps gives you more than your ordinary printed calendar ever could.
